text: What would you do on your ideal weekend?

options.text: Video games
Crafting something or working on my PC
My hobby! (Art, music, etc.)
Reading books

text: Where do you see yourself in 10 years?

options.text: Married and happy
Become a witch and have five cats
Becoming a mad scientist!
I become the president!

text: While going on a walk, you find a suitcase with more money than you can count. What do you do?

options.text: Yay! Free money!
Hand it over to the police
Bury the money somewhere safe and use it little by little
I can make this into even more money by betting on my favorite Uma

text: Which kind of anime world would you prefer to wake up in after getting a gentle kiss from Truck-kun’s bumper?

options.text: A world where I can get magical powers
A world with spirits and supernatural events
A world that is currently in a state of war
A dystopia is totally my vibe

text: If someone traveled inside your head, what would they find?

options.text: NOTHING IMPORTANT! *Hides the lewd*
Absolute chaos with 20 different Chrome tabs open, and I have no idea where the music is coming from
Generational longing
They’re gonna know all about the fantasy novel I’m planning out

text: You are walking home when you see two groups of people fighting. What do you do?

options.text: I wonder why they’re fighting? Let’s observe safely
Join in and try to beat up everyone
I run away super fast—I run track
Talk to both sides, broker peace, and become their leader

text: You start a new anime. Who are you shipping?

options.text: The male and female lead, because they’ll definitely get together
Two cute female characters, duh
The male lead and his best friend
The MC and the villain

text: What’s your favorite subject among these?

options.text: Psychology
Archaeology
Literature
I don’t want to study! Let’s play some sports!

text: You’ve joined the college of your dreams! Which club activity will you join?

options.text: Martial arts club
The swim team
Ghost-hunting club
Robotics club

text: Your partner is mad at you. How do you figure it out?

options.text: Talk to them and try to work it out
Analyze every moment in the past week
Time to implant a neural chip
Don’t know, because I never realized I had a partner until 20 years later
